name: Bunnyrama Demo
description:
Old man is in trouble. He must escape from the magical forest and find his way home. The only way out is to use the portal gates, but they are not easy to reach. Will you help the old man to get out of the forest?

Bunnyrama is a puzzle adventure game where your goal is to lead the old man through the magical forest full of huge bunnies. Each level is a labyrinth with different puzzles, and only one exit. Bunnies will help you, carry and stack them properly, use their unique features to build your way to the portal, and help Grandpa find his way home.

Bunnyrama is a light hearted game with humour and easy to learn, but with challenging game mechanics.

Bunnies kindly ask you to vote for the game on Greenlight!

Bunnyrama Greenlight Page

Please let us know what do you think, your feedback is 100% welcome.
